etymology.description: Depicts a cloud with drops of rain falling from it -> horizontal stroke added later -> rain
etymology.interpretation: 雨(雨) (yǔ, "rain") visually represents rain falling from a cloud, capturing its essential form.

examples.chinese: 今天雨下得很大(今天雨下得很大)。
examples.pinyin: Jīntiān yǔ xià de hěn dà.

examples.chinese: 他忘记带伞(他忘記帶傘)，雨却毫不留情(雨卻毫不留情)。
examples.pinyin: Tā wàngjì dài sǎn, yǔ què háobù liúqíng.
examples.english: He forgot to bring an umbrella, and the rain showed no mercy.

examples.chinese: 细雨如丝(細雨如絲)，轻拂着花瓣(輕拂著花瓣)。
examples.pinyin: Xì yǔ rú sī, qīng fú zhe huā bàn.
examples.english: The fine rain falls like silk, gently brushing the petals.
